DOC.brief_summary: 900 subject receive dental implant 9-10 year ago invite clinical radiographic examination . The individual randomly select National Health Insurance data register Sweden . The clinical radiographic examination 900 select subject include assessment implant loss , loss prosthesis technical / biological complication . Biological complication assess finding clinical radiographic examination . Thus , sign pathology peri-implant tissue , probe pocket depth ( PPD ) bleeding/pus probe ( BoP ) record . Marginal bone loss finding radiograph also evaluate . The prevalence , extent severity peri-implantitis hereby determine . Patient-centered outcome also obtain .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Radiographic Outcomes Dental Implant Therapy
DOC.criteria: A questionnaire distributed 4716 identified subject . 3827 questionnaire ( 81.15 % ) return , hence , include analysis . From sample 3827 patient respond questionnaire , 3107 ( 81.19 % ) give consent access patient files/records . Patient files/records 2780 individual could collect treat dentist ( 89.48 % ) . Out 2780 , 900 individual select random sample , stratify two age group . Having receive implant within Swedish insurance system 2003/2004 . Being one two age group 2003 : 6575 year 45 55 year . Having answer initial questionnaire Treating dentist provide patient files/records Having die study period ( collection questionnaire patient files/records )
